record.col: 过滤方式=机构过滤;机构字段名=CREATEDEPT;人员字段名=CREATOR;

if(getEditState()!="INIT"&&getItemValue("RISKRANK")!=""&&getItemValue("FINDRANK")!="",setItemValue("referscore",getSQLValue("字符串","select score from score_standard where riskrank='"+getItemValue("RISKRANK")+"' and findrank='"+getItemValue("FINDRANK")+"'","null")),setItemValue("referscore",""));
